trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of parameters associated with a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> and their respective mappings to columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示相關聯的參數集合<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>它們中的資料行之個別對應<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.

If the command contains an ad hoc SQL statement, as opposed to a stored-procedure name, the number of the parameters in the collection must be equal to the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, or SQL Server raises an error.
trans-unit.target: 當命令包含特定的 SQL 陳述式，而不是預存程序名稱的集合中的參數數目必須等於命令文字內的參數預留位置的數字，或 SQL Server 就會引發錯誤。

trans-unit.source: With a stored procedure, all the parameters declared in the stored procedure without a default value must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 預存程序，必須提供所有預存程序，沒有預設值所宣告的參數。

trans-unit.source: Parameters declared with a default value are optional.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值宣告的參數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: This lets you specify a value other than the default.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您指定預設以外的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information with additional sample code demonstrating how to use parameters, see [Commands and Parameters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何使用參數的其他範例程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[命令和參數](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.
The specified in the value parameter is already added to this or another .
trans-unit.target: 中所指定 value 參數已加入至這個或另一個 。

trans-unit.source: The parameter passed was not a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref>.
The value parameter is null.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Object>.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.
Adds a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and the data type.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref>至<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>已知參數名稱和資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlDbType"></xref> values.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
A <xref:System.Object>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.

Use caution when you are using this overload of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlParameterCollection.Add" name="SqlParameterCollection.Add" href=""></xref> method to specify integer parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用的這個多載時請特別小心<xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlParameterCollection.Add" name="SqlParameterCollection.Add" href=""></xref>方法，以指定整數參數值。

trans-unit.source: Because this overload takes a value of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
trans-unit.target: 因為此多載會採用 value 型別的，您必須將整數值轉換時輸入的值為零，如下列 C# 範例所示。

trans-unit.source: ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlParameterCollection.Add" name="SqlParameterCollection.Add" href=""></xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlDbType" name="SqlDbType" href=""></xref>) overload.
trans-unit.target: ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```如果您不會執行這項轉換，則編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫<xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlParameterCollection.Add" name="SqlParameterCollection.Add" href=""> </xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlDbType" name="SqlDbType" href=""> </xref>) 多載。

trans-unit.source: The specified in the value parameter is already added to this or another .
trans-unit.target: 中所指定 value 參數已加入至這個或另一個 。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is null.

Adds a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>, given the specified parameter name, <xref href="System.Data.SqlDbType"></xref> and size.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref>至<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"> </xref>，給定的指定的參數名稱， <xref href="System.Data.SqlDbType"> </xref>和大小。

trans-unit.source: This overload is useful when you are adding a parameter of a variable-length data type such as `varchar` or `binary`.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載時，您要加入的可變長度資料型別參數，例如`varchar`或`binary`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlDbType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
The size as an <xref:System.Int32>.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.
Adds a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> with the parameter name, the data type, and the column length.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref>至<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>參數名稱、 資料類型，與資料行的長度。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlDbType"></xref> values.
The column length.

The name of the source column (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter.SourceColumn*>) if this <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> is used in a call to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
trans-unit.target: 來源資料行的名稱 (<>*>) 如果此<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref>用於呼叫<> *>。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an array of values to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Array> values to add.
Adds an array of <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> values to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> values to add.
Adds a value to the end of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
AddWithValue replaces the `SqlParameterCollection.Add` method that takes a <xref:System.String> and an <xref:System.Object>.

The overload of `Add` that takes a string and an object was deprecated because of possible ambiguity with the `SqlParameterCollection.Add` overload that takes a <xref:System.String> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlDbType> enumeration value where passing an integer with the string could be interpreted as being either the parameter value or the corresponding <xref:System.Data.SqlDbType> value.
trans-unit.target: 多載`Add`採用字串和物件已被取代，因為可能模稜兩可，與`SqlParameterCollection.Add`採用多載<xref:System.String>和<xref:System.Data.SqlDbType>其中傳遞的整數之字串可能會解譯為參數值或對應的列舉值<xref:System.Data.SqlDbType>值。</xref:System.Data.SqlDbType> </xref:System.Data.SqlDbType> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Use AddWithValue whenever you want to add a parameter by specifying its name and value.
trans-unit.target: 每當您想要藉由指定其名稱和值加入參數，請使用 AddWithValue。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Data.SqlDbType>`Xml` enumeration values, you can use a string, an XML value, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> derived type instance, or a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> object.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Data.SqlDbType>`Xml`列舉值，您可以使用字串時，XML 值，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>衍生類型執行個體，或<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>物件。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader></xref:System.Data.SqlDbType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
The value to be added.
Use <xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref> instead of null, to indicate a null value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref href="System.DBNull.Value"></xref>而不是 null，表示 null 值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> object.
Removes all the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> contains the value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> contains the value; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> starting at the specified destination <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: 目前的所有項目複製<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>於指定的一維<xref:System.Array>開始於指定的目的地<xref:System.Array>索引。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>，是從目前的複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref:System.Array> at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，表示在索引<xref:System.Array>在複製開始的位置。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 目前的所有項目複製<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>開始於指定的目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"> </xref> ，是從目前的複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，表示在索引<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>在複製開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns an Integer that contains the number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回一個整數，包含中的項目數<xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"> </xref>。

The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection"></xref> as an Integer.
